modName: Aurora - Character Creation Overhaul Text Patch
summary: Aurora - Character Creation Overhaul Text Patch
descriptionHtml: I made a patch that adds the desriptions for the standing stones in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29311]Aurora - Standing Stones of Skyrim[/url]Â to the birthsign section of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21587]Character Creation Overhaul[/url]. It's a very small and simple patch, so there should be zero compatibility issues with other mods.
author: Golmore
